description:
pluginlib_nova.py contains logging that makes use of gettext without importing it.

We need to add

import gettext
gettext.install('nova', unicode=1)

to the top of the file.
title: pluginlib_nova needs gettext

comments.content:
pluginlib_nova.py contains logging that makes use of gettext without importing it.

We need to add

import gettext
gettext.install('nova', unicode=1)

to the top of the file.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris
